description:
XTG Technology PhotoPro Dual Lithium Ion Chargeris the ultimate in speed and performance.Whether you are new to the photography world or a seasoned professional, this is the last charger you will ever need.The PhotoPro comes with all of the features, safety protections, and add-on's you will need to charge your camera batteries as well as any other 

USB powered device.With the ability to charge two batteries 3 times faster than a normal charger, the PhotoPro leads to less downtime during a shoot.Need a charge on your cell phone or tablet as well? Take advantage of the 2A USB charging output while your Canon batteries are charging.The premium display gives you a clear picture of how much life your batteries have left so you can manage your time efficiently.Combine all of this with the industry leading, 2 year XTG warranty, and you'll see why this is an essential piece of your gear.Compatible withCanonEOS 5D Mark II, Mark III, Mark 2, Mark 3, EOS 7D, 60D Cameras
title: PhotoPro Dual Charger for Canon LP-E6 Camera Batteries - Works with Canon EOS 5D Mark II / 2, Mark III / 3, EOS 7D, 60D Digital Cameras - Intelligent, Super-fast Charger with 2 Independent Charging Bays, LCD Readout, Battery Tester, USB Output, Car Charger and UL Approved Wall Charger
